main event: On June 8, 1959, two bright objects were observed darting and maneuvering in the sky near Lyons, Colorado.
interesting points: The objects showed erratic flight patterns, came together and then separated, They did not conform to any known aircraft, Witness estimated the objects' speed to be about 800 mph, The objects appeared to be made of dark metallic material, One witness described the objects as having a dull, non-luminous appearance.
sighted object: two bright objects in the sky
witness description: The witness reported an unusual sighting with a peculiar feeling to look up at the sky.
